summary: Norman Mailer's first feature filmmaking effort stars the director and his two longtime collaborators Buzz Farbar and Mickey Knox as a trio of gangsters holed up in a ramshackle New York apartment, drinking, braying, and fighting.
cast: Norman Mailer|Buzz Farber|Mickey Knox|Beverly Bentley|Jos√© Torres|Mara Lynn|Dick Adler|Harold Conrad|Brian Hamill|Milt Machlin|Ramona Torres|D.A. Pennebaker
title: Wild 90
